trans-unit.source: Represents a simple last-in-first-out (LIFO) non-generic collection of objects.
trans-unit.target: 表示对象的简单后进先出 (LIFO) 非泛型集合。

trans-unit.source: For the generic version of this collection, see <xref:System.Collections.Generic.Stack%601?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 此集合的泛型版本，请参阅<xref:System.Collections.Generic.Stack%601?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: The capacity of a <xref:System.Collections.Stack> is the number of elements the <xref:System.Collections.Stack> can hold.
trans-unit.target: 容量<xref:System.Collections.Stack>是元素的数目<xref:System.Collections.Stack>可以保存。

trans-unit.source: As elements are added to a <xref:System.Collections.Stack>, the capacity is automatically increased as required through reallocation.
trans-unit.target: 如元素添加到<xref:System.Collections.Stack>，自动增加容量通过重新分配所需的方式。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Collections.Stack.Count%2A> is less than the capacity of the stack, <xref:System.Collections.Stack.Push%2A> is an O(1) operation.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Collections.Stack.Count%2A>小于的堆栈，容量<xref:System.Collections.Stack.Push%2A>o （1） 运算。

trans-unit.source: If the capacity needs to be increased to accommodate the new element, <xref:System.Collections.Stack.Push%2A> becomes an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is <xref:System.Collections.Stack.Count%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如果需要增加以容纳新元素，容量<xref:System.Collections.Stack.Push%2A>会成为 O (`n`) 操作，其中`n`是<xref:System.Collections.Stack.Count%2A>。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Collections.Stack.Pop%2A> is an O(1) operation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.Stack.Pop%2A> 是一项 o （1） 操作。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Collections.Stack> accepts `null` as a valid value and allows duplicate elements.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.Stack> 接受`null`作为有效的值，并允许重复的元素。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to create and add values to a <xref:System.Collections.Stack> and how to display its values.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何创建并将值添加到<xref:System.Collections.Stack>以及如何显示其值。

trans-unit.source: Public static (<see langword="Shared" /> in Visual Basic) members of this type are thread safe.
trans-unit.target: 公共静态 (<see langword="Shared" />在 Visual Basic 中) 的此类型的成员都是线程安全。

trans-unit.source: Any instance members are not guaranteed to be thread safe.
trans-unit.target: 但不保证所有实例成员都是线程安全的。

trans-unit.source: To guarantee the thread safety of the <see cref="T:System.Collections.Stack" />, all operations must be done through the wrapper returned by the <see cref="M:System.Collections.Stack.Synchronized(System.Collections.Stack)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要确保的线程安全性<see cref="T:System.Collections.Stack" />，所有操作必须通过返回的包装器来都完成<see cref="M:System.Collections.Stack.Synchronized(System.Collections.Stack)" />方法。

trans-unit.source: Enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure.
trans-unit.target: 枚举整个集合本质上不是一个线程安全的过程。

trans-unit.source: Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads can still modify the collection, which causes the enumerator to throw an exception.
trans-unit.target: 即使某个集合已同步，其他线程仍可以修改该集合，这会导致枚举数引发异常。

trans-unit.source: To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can either lock the collection during the entire enumeration or catch the exceptions resulting from changes made by other threads.
trans-unit.target: 若要确保枚举过程中的线程安全性，可以在整个枚举期间锁定集合，或者捕获由其他线程进行的更改所导致的异常。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Collections.Stack" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Stack" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Collections.Stack" /> class that is empty and has the default initial capacity.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Stack" /> 类的新实例，该实例为空并且具有默认初始容量。

trans-unit.source: The capacity of a <xref:System.Collections.Stack> is the number of elements that the <xref:System.Collections.Stack> can hold.
trans-unit.target: 容量<xref:System.Collections.Stack>是元素的数目，<xref:System.Collections.Stack>可以保存。

trans-unit.source: As elements are added to a <xref:System.Collections.Stack>, the capacity is automatically increased as required by reallocating the internal array.
trans-unit.target: 如元素添加到<xref:System.Collections.Stack>，自动增加容量通过重新分配在内部数组所需的方式。

trans-unit.source: If the size of the collection can be estimated, specifying the initial capacity eliminates the need to perform a number of resizing operations while adding elements to the <xref:System.Collections.Stack>.
trans-unit.target: 如果可以估计集合的大小，指定的初始容量，则无需执行大量的大小将元素添加到时调整操作<xref:System.Collections.Stack>。

trans-unit.source: This constructor is an O(1) operation.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数是 o （1） 操作。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Collections.ICollection" /> to copy elements from.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Collections.ICollection" />，从其中复制元素。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Collections.Stack" /> class that contains elements copied from the specified collection and has the same initial capacity as the number of elements copied.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Stack" /> 类的新实例，该实例包含从指定集合复制的元素并且具有与所复制的元素数相同的初始容量。

trans-unit.source: The capacity of a <xref:System.Collections.Stack> is the number of elements that the <xref:System.Collections.Stack> can hold.
trans-unit.target: 容量<xref:System.Collections.Stack>是元素的数目，<xref:System.Collections.Stack>可以保存。

trans-unit.source: As elements are added to a <xref:System.Collections.Stack>, the capacity is automatically increased as required by reallocating the internal array.
trans-unit.target: 如元素添加到<xref:System.Collections.Stack>，自动增加容量通过重新分配在内部数组所需的方式。

trans-unit.source: If the size of the collection can be estimated, specifying the initial capacity eliminates the need to perform a number of resizing operations while adding elements to the <xref:System.Collections.Stack>.
trans-unit.target: 如果可以估计集合的大小，指定的初始容量，则无需执行大量的大小将元素添加到时调整操作<xref:System.Collections.Stack>。

trans-unit.source: The elements are copied onto the <xref:System.Collections.Stack> in the same order they are read by the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator> of the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>.
trans-unit.target: 将元素复制到<xref:System.Collections.Stack>以相同的顺序由读取<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>的<xref:System.Collections.ICollection>。

trans-unit.source: This constructor is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is the number of elements in `col`.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数是 O (`n`) 操作，其中`n`是中的元素数`col`。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="col" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="col" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The initial number of elements that the <see cref="T:System.Collections.Stack" /> can contain.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Collections.Stack" /> 可包含的初始元素数。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Collections.Stack" /> class that is empty and has the specified initial capacity or the default initial capacity, whichever is greater.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Stack" /> 类的新实例，该实例为空并且具有指定的初始容量或默认初始容量（这两个容量中的较大者）。

trans-unit.source: The capacity of a <xref:System.Collections.Stack> is the number of elements that the <xref:System.Collections.Stack> can hold.
trans-unit.target: 容量<xref:System.Collections.Stack>是元素的数目，<xref:System.Collections.Stack>可以保存。

trans-unit.source: As elements are added to a <xref:System.Collections.Stack>, the capacity is automatically increased as required by reallocating the internal array.
trans-unit.target: 如元素添加到<xref:System.Collections.Stack>，自动增加容量通过重新分配在内部数组所需的方式。

trans-unit.source: If the size of the collection can be estimated, specifying the initial capacity eliminates the need to perform a number of resizing operations while adding elements to the <xref:System.Collections.Stack>.
trans-unit.target: 如果可以估计集合的大小，指定的初始容量，则无需执行大量的大小将元素添加到时调整操作<xref:System.Collections.Stack>。

trans-unit.source: This constructor is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is `initialCapacity`.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数是 O (`n`) 操作，其中`n`是`initialCapacity`。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="initialCapacity" /> is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="initialCapacity" /> 小于零。

trans-unit.source: Removes all objects from the <see cref="T:System.Collections.Stack" />.
trans-unit.target: 从 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Stack" /> 中移除所有对象。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Collections.Stack.Count%2A> is set to zero, and references to other objects from elements of the collection are also released.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.Stack.Count%2A> 是设置为零，并且集合的元素对其他对象的引用也被释放。

trans-unit.source: This method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is <xref:System.Collections.Stack.Count%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 此方法为 O (`n`) 操作，其中`n`是<xref:System.Collections.Stack.Count%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to clear the values of the <xref:System.Collections.Stack>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何清除的值<xref:System.Collections.Stack>。

trans-unit.source: Creates a shallow copy of the <see cref="T:System.Collections.Stack" />.
trans-unit.target: 创建 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Stack" /> 的浅表副本。

trans-unit.source: A shallow copy of the <see cref="T:System.Collections.Stack" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Collections.Stack" /> 的浅表副本。

trans-unit.source: A shallow copy of a collection copies only the elements of the collection, whether they are reference types or value types, but it does not copy the objects that the references refer to.
trans-unit.target: 集合的浅表副本复制仅的元素集合，不论它们是引用类型还是值类型，但它不会复制引用所引用的对象。

trans-unit.source: The references in the new collection point to the same objects that the references in the original collection point to.
trans-unit.target: 新集合中的引用都指向原始集合中的引用指向同一对象。

trans-unit.source: In contrast, a deep copy of a collection copies the elements and everything directly or indirectly referenced by the elements.
trans-unit.target: 与此相反，集合的深层副本复制这些元素，以及由这些元素直接或间接引用的所有内容。

trans-unit.source: This method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is <xref:System.Collections.Stack.Count%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 此方法为 O (`n`) 操作，其中`n`是<xref:System.Collections.Stack.Count%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The object to locate in the <see cref="T:System.Collections.Stack" />.
trans-unit.target: 要在 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Stack" /> 中定位的对象。

trans-unit.source: The value can be <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 该值可以为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether an element is in the <see cref="T:System.Collections.Stack" />.
trans-unit.target: 确定某元素是否在 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Stack" /> 中。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" />, if <paramref name="obj" /> is found in the <see cref="T:System.Collections.Stack" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果在 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Stack" /> 中找到 <paramref name="obj" />，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This method determines equality by calling the <xref:System.Object.Equals%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 此方法通过调用可确定相等性<xref:System.Object.Equals%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: This method performs a linear search; therefore, this method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is <xref:System.Collections.Stack.Count%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 此方法执行的线性搜索;因此，此方法为 O (`n`) 操作，其中`n`是<xref:System.Collections.Stack.Count%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Starting with the .NET Framework 2.0, this method tests for equality by passing the `obj` argument to the <xref:System.Object.Equals%2A> method of individual objects in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 从.NET Framework 2.0 开始，此方法的测试相等性通过传递`obj`参数<xref:System.Object.Equals%2A>的集合中的单个对象的方法。

trans-unit.source: In the earlier versions of the .NET Framework, this determination was made by using passing the individual items in the collection to the <xref:System.Object.Equals%2A> method of the `obj` argument.
trans-unit.target: 在.NET Framework 的早期版本，通过传递到集合中的各个项进行此决定<xref:System.Object.Equals%2A>方法`obj`自变量。

trans-unit.source: The one-dimensional <see cref="T:System.Array" /> that is the destination of the elements copied from <see cref="T:System.Collections.Stack" />.
trans-unit.target: 一维 <see cref="T:System.Array" />，它是从 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Stack" /> 复制的元素的目标。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Array" /> must have zero-based indexing.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Array" /> 必须具有从零开始的索引。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index in <c>array</c> at which copying begins.
trans-unit.target: <c>array</c> 中从零开始的索引，在此处开始复制。

trans-unit.source: Copies the <see cref="T:System.Collections.Stack" /> to an existing one-dimensional <see cref="T:System.Array" />, starting at the specified array index.
trans-unit.target: 从指定数组索引开始将 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Stack" /> 复制到现有一维 <see cref="T:System.Array" /> 中。

trans-unit.source: The elements are copied onto the array in last-in-first-out (LIFO) order, similar to the order of the elements returned by a succession of calls to <xref:System.Collections.Stack.Pop%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 将元素复制到的数组中先出 (LIFO) 顺序，对由调用的一系列元素的顺序类似<xref:System.Collections.Stack.Pop%2A>。

trans-unit.source: This method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is <xref:System.Collections.Stack.Count%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 此方法为 O (`n`) 操作，其中`n`是<xref:System.Collections.Stack.Count%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to copy a <xref:System.Collections.Stack> into a one-dimensional array.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何复制<xref:System.Collections.Stack>到一维数组。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="array" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="array" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="index" /> is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="index" /> 小于零。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="array" /> is multidimensional.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="array" /> 是多维的。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: The number of elements in the source <see cref="T:System.Collections.Stack" /> is greater than the available space from <paramref name="index" /> to the end of the destination <paramref name="array" />.
trans-unit.target: 源 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Stack" /> 中的元素个数大于从 <paramref name="index" /> 到目标 <paramref name="array" /> 末尾之间的可用空间。

trans-unit.source: The type of the source <see cref="T:System.Collections.Stack" /> cannot be cast automatically to the type of the destination <paramref name="array" />.
trans-unit.target: 无法自动将源 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Stack" /> 的类型转换为目标 <paramref name="array" /> 的类型。

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of elements contained in the <see cref="T:System.Collections.Stack" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Stack" /> 中包含的元素数。

trans-unit.source: The number of elements contained in the <see cref="T:System.Collections.Stack" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Collections.Stack" /> 中包含的元素数。

trans-unit.source: The capacity is the number of elements that the <xref:System.Collections.Stack> can store.
trans-unit.target: 容量是元素的数目，<xref:System.Collections.Stack>可以存储。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Collections.Stack.Count%2A> is the number of elements that are actually in the <xref:System.Collections.Stack>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.Stack.Count%2A> 是中的实际的元素数目<xref:System.Collections.Stack>。

trans-unit.source: The capacity is always greater than or equal to <xref:System.Collections.Stack.Count%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 容量始终是大于或等于<xref:System.Collections.Stack.Count%2A>。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Collections.Stack.Count%2A> exceeds the capacity while adding elements, the capacity is automatically increased by reallocating the internal array before copying the old elements and adding the new elements.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Collections.Stack.Count%2A>添加元素时超过容量，通过在复制旧元素和添加新的元素之前重新分配在内部数组自动增加容量。

trans-unit.source: Retrieving the value of this property is an O(1) operation.
trans-unit.target: 检索此属性的值的运算复杂度为 O(1)。

trans-unit.source: Returns an <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerator" /> for the <see cref="T:System.Collections.Stack" />.
trans-unit.target: 返回 <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerator" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Stack" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerator" /> for the <see cref="T:System.Collections.Stack" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerator" /> 的一个 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Stack" />。

trans-unit.source: [Visual Basic, C#]
trans-unit.target: [Visual Basic、 C#]

trans-unit.source: The `foreach` statement of the C# language (`for each` in Visual Basic) hides the complexity of the enumerators.
trans-unit.target: C# 语言的 `foreach` 语句（在 Visual Basic 中为 `for each`）隐藏了枚举数的复杂性。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, using `foreach` is recommended, instead of directly manipulating the enumerator.
trans-unit.target: 因此，建议使用 `foreach`，而不是直接操作枚举数。

trans-unit.source: Enumerators can be used to read the data in the collection, but they cannot be used to modify the underlying collection.
trans-unit.target: 枚举器可用于读取集合中的数据，但不能用于修改基础集合。

trans-unit.source: Initially, the enumerator is positioned before the first element in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 最初，枚举数定位在集合中第一个元素的前面。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A> also brings the enumerator back to this position.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A> 也会将枚举器放回此位置。

trans-unit.source: At this position, <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A> is undefined.
trans-unit.target: 在此位置上，未定义 <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, you must call <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> to advance the enumerator to the first element of the collection before reading the value of <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 因此，在读取 <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> 的值之前，必须调用 <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A> 将枚举器向前移动到集合的第一个元素。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A> returns the same object until either <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> or <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A> is called.
trans-unit.target: 在调用 <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A> 或 <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> 之前，<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A> 返回同一对象。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> sets <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A> to the next element.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> 将 <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A> 设置为下一个元素。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> passes the end of the collection, the enumerator is positioned after the last element in the collection and <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>越过的末尾的集合，枚举数定位在集合中的最后一个元素的后面和<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>返回`false`。

trans-unit.source: When the enumerator is at this position, subsequent calls to <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> also return `false`.
trans-unit.target: 当枚举器位于此位置上，后续调用<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>还返回`false`。

trans-unit.source: If the last call to <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> returned `false`, <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A> is undefined.
trans-unit.target: 如果最后一次调用到<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>返回`false`，<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A>是不确定的。

trans-unit.source: To set <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A> to the first element of the collection again, you can call <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A> followed by <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 若要再次将 <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A> 设置为集合的第一个元素，可以调用 <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A> 并接着调用 <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>。

trans-unit.source: An enumerator remains valid as long as the collection remains unchanged.
trans-unit.target: 只要集合保持不变，枚举数就保持有效。

trans-unit.source: If changes are made to the collection, such as adding, modifying, or deleting elements, the enumerator is irrecoverably invalidated and its behavior is undefined.
trans-unit.target: 如果对集合进行更改（如添加、修改或删除元素），则枚举数将失效且不可恢复，而且其行为是不确定的。

trans-unit.source: The enumerator does not have exclusive access to the collection; therefore, enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure.
trans-unit.target: 枚举数没有对集合的独占访问权；因此，从头到尾对一个集合进行枚举在本质上不是一个线程安全的过程。

trans-unit.source: To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can lock the collection during the entire enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 若要确保枚举过程中的线程安全性，可以在整个枚举过程中锁定集合。

trans-unit.source: To allow the collection to be accessed by multiple threads for reading and writing, you must implement your own synchronization.
trans-unit.target: 若要允许多个线程访问集合以进行读写操作，则必须实现自己的同步。

trans-unit.source: This method is an O(1) operation.
trans-unit.target: 此方法为 o （1） 运算。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether access to the <see cref="T:System.Collections.Stack" /> is synchronized (thread safe).
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示是否同步对 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Stack" /> 的访问（线程安全）。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" />, if access to the <see cref="T:System.Collections.Stack" /> is synchronized (thread safe); otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果对 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Stack" /> 的访问是同步的（线程安全），则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: To guarantee the thread safety of the <xref:System.Collections.Stack>, all operations must be done through the wrapper returned by the <xref:System.Collections.Stack.Synchronized%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要确保的线程安全性<xref:System.Collections.Stack>，所有操作必须通过返回的包装器来都完成<xref:System.Collections.Stack.Synchronized%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure.
trans-unit.target: 枚举整个集合本质上不是一个线程安全的过程。

trans-unit.source: Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads can still modify the collection, which causes the enumerator to throw an exception.
trans-unit.target: 即使某个集合已同步，其他线程仍可以修改该集合，这会导致枚举数引发异常。

trans-unit.source: To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can either lock the collection during the entire enumeration or catch the exceptions resulting from changes made by other threads.
trans-unit.target: 若要确保枚举过程中的线程安全性，可以在整个枚举期间锁定集合，或者捕获由其他线程进行的更改所导致的异常。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to lock the collection using the <xref:System.Collections.Stack.SyncRoot%2A> during the entire enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何锁定集合使用<xref:System.Collections.Stack.SyncRoot%2A>在整个枚举期间。

trans-unit.source: Retrieving the value of this property is an O(1) operation.
trans-unit.target: 检索此属性的值的运算复杂度为 O(1)。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to synchronize a <xref:System.Collections.Stack>, determine if a <xref:System.Collections.Stack> is synchronized, and use a synchronized <xref:System.Collections.Stack>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何同步<xref:System.Collections.Stack>，确定如果<xref:System.Collections.Stack>已同步，以及如何使用同步<xref:System.Collections.Stack>。

trans-unit.source: Returns the object at the top of the <see cref="T:System.Collections.Stack" /> without removing it.
trans-unit.target: 返回位于 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Stack" /> 顶部的对象但不将其移除。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Object" /> at the top of the <see cref="T:System.Collections.Stack" />.
trans-unit.target: 位于 <see cref="T:System.Object" /> 顶部的 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Stack" />。

trans-unit.source: This method is similar to the <xref:System.Collections.Stack.Pop%2A> method, but <xref:System.Collections.Stack.Peek%2A> does not modify the <xref:System.Collections.Stack>.
trans-unit.target: 此方法类似于 <xref:System.Collections.Stack.Pop%2A> 方法，但 <xref:System.Collections.Stack.Peek%2A> 不修改 <xref:System.Collections.Stack>。

trans-unit.source: `null` can be pushed onto the <xref:System.Collections.Stack> as a placeholder, if needed.
trans-unit.target: `null` 可以被推送到<xref:System.Collections.Stack>用作占位符，如有必要。

trans-unit.source: To distinguish between a null value and the end of the stack, check the <xref:System.Collections.Stack.Count%2A> property or catch the <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>, which is thrown when the <xref:System.Collections.Stack> is empty.
trans-unit.target: 若要区分 null 值和在堆栈结尾，请检查<xref:System.Collections.Stack.Count%2A>属性或 catch <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>，时引发<xref:System.Collections.Stack>为空。

trans-unit.source: This method is an O(1) operation.
trans-unit.target: 此方法为 o （1） 运算。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to add elements to the <xref:System.Collections.Stack>, remove elements from the <xref:System.Collections.Stack>, or view the element at the top of the <xref:System.Collections.Stack>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何将元素添加到<xref:System.Collections.Stack>，从中移除元素<xref:System.Collections.Stack>，或查看在顶部的元素<xref:System.Collections.Stack>。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Collections.Stack" /> is empty.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Collections.Stack" /> 为空。

trans-unit.source: Removes and returns the object at the top of the <see cref="T:System.Collections.Stack" />.
trans-unit.target: 移除并返回位于 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Stack" /> 顶部的对象。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Object" /> removed from the top of the <see cref="T:System.Collections.Stack" />.
trans-unit.target: 从 <see cref="T:System.Object" /> 的顶部移除的 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Stack" />。

trans-unit.source: This method is similar to the <xref:System.Collections.Stack.Peek%2A> method, but <xref:System.Collections.Stack.Peek%2A> does not modify the <xref:System.Collections.Stack>.
trans-unit.target: 此方法类似于 <xref:System.Collections.Stack.Peek%2A> 方法，但 <xref:System.Collections.Stack.Peek%2A> 不修改 <xref:System.Collections.Stack>。

trans-unit.source: `null` can be pushed onto the <xref:System.Collections.Stack> as a placeholder, if needed.
trans-unit.target: `null` 可以被推送到<xref:System.Collections.Stack>用作占位符，如有必要。

trans-unit.source: To distinguish between a null value and the end of the stack, check the <xref:System.Collections.Stack.Count%2A> property or catch the <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>, which is thrown when the <xref:System.Collections.Stack> is empty.
trans-unit.target: 若要区分 null 值和在堆栈结尾，请检查<xref:System.Collections.Stack.Count%2A>属性或 catch <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>，时引发<xref:System.Collections.Stack>为空。

trans-unit.source: This method is an O(1) operation.
trans-unit.target: 此方法为 o （1） 运算。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to add elements to the <xref:System.Collections.Stack>, remove elements from the <xref:System.Collections.Stack>, or view the element at the top of the <xref:System.Collections.Stack>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何将元素添加到<xref:System.Collections.Stack>，从中移除元素<xref:System.Collections.Stack>，或查看在顶部的元素<xref:System.Collections.Stack>。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Collections.Stack" /> is empty.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Collections.Stack" /> 为空。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Object" /> to push onto the <see cref="T:System.Collections.Stack" />.
trans-unit.target: 要推入到 <see cref="T:System.Object" /> 中的 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Stack" />。

trans-unit.source: The value can be <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 该值可以为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Inserts an object at the top of the <see cref="T:System.Collections.Stack" />.
trans-unit.target: 在 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Stack" /> 的顶部插入一个对象。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Collections.Stack.Count%2A> already equals the capacity, the capacity of the <xref:System.Collections.Stack> is increased by automatically reallocating the internal array, and the existing elements are copied to the new array before the new element is added.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Collections.Stack.Count%2A>已经等于容量的容量<xref:System.Collections.Stack>增加通过自动重新分配在内部数组和现有元素被复制到新数组中，在添加新的元素之前。

trans-unit.source: `null` can be pushed onto the <xref:System.Collections.Stack> as a placeholder, if needed.
trans-unit.target: `null` 可以被推送到<xref:System.Collections.Stack>用作占位符，如有必要。

trans-unit.source: It occupies a slot in the stack and is treated like any object.
trans-unit.target: 它将占用堆栈中的槽，并且都被视为任何对象。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Collections.Stack.Count%2A> is less than the capacity of the stack, <xref:System.Collections.Stack.Push%2A> is an O(1) operation.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Collections.Stack.Count%2A>小于的堆栈，容量<xref:System.Collections.Stack.Push%2A>o （1） 运算。

trans-unit.source: If the capacity needs to be increased to accommodate the new element, <xref:System.Collections.Stack.Push%2A> becomes an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is <xref:System.Collections.Stack.Count%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如果需要增加以容纳新元素，容量<xref:System.Collections.Stack.Push%2A>会成为 O (`n`) 操作，其中`n`是<xref:System.Collections.Stack.Count%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to add elements to the <xref:System.Collections.Stack>, remove elements from the <xref:System.Collections.Stack>, or view the element at the top of the <xref:System.Collections.Stack>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何将元素添加到<xref:System.Collections.Stack>，从中移除元素<xref:System.Collections.Stack>，或查看在顶部的元素<xref:System.Collections.Stack>。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Collections.Stack" /> to synchronize.
trans-unit.target: 要同步的 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Stack" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns a synchronized (thread safe) wrapper for the <see cref="T:System.Collections.Stack" />.
trans-unit.target: 返回 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Stack" /> 的同步（线程安全）包装。

trans-unit.source: A synchronized wrapper around the <see cref="T:System.Collections.Stack" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Collections.Stack" /> 周围的同步包装。

trans-unit.source: To guarantee the thread safety of the <xref:System.Collections.Stack>, all operations must be done through this wrapper.
trans-unit.target: 若要确保的线程安全性<xref:System.Collections.Stack>，必须通过此包装器完成所有操作。

trans-unit.source: Enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure.
trans-unit.target: 枚举整个集合本质上不是一个线程安全的过程。

trans-unit.source: Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads can still modify the collection, which causes the enumerator to throw an exception.
trans-unit.target: 即使某个集合已同步，其他线程仍可以修改该集合，这会导致枚举数引发异常。

trans-unit.source: To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can either lock the collection during the entire enumeration or catch the exceptions resulting from changes made by other threads.
trans-unit.target: 若要确保枚举过程中的线程安全性，可以在整个枚举期间锁定集合，或者捕获由其他线程进行的更改所导致的异常。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to lock the collection using the <xref:System.Collections.Stack.SyncRoot%2A> during the entire enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何锁定集合使用<xref:System.Collections.Stack.SyncRoot%2A>在整个枚举期间。

trans-unit.source: This method is an O(1) operation.
trans-unit.target: 此方法为 o （1） 运算。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to synchronize a <xref:System.Collections.Stack>, determine if a <xref:System.Collections.Stack> is synchronized, and use a synchronized <xref:System.Collections.Stack>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何同步<xref:System.Collections.Stack>，确定如果<xref:System.Collections.Stack>已同步，以及如何使用同步<xref:System.Collections.Stack>。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="stack" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="stack" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets an object that can be used to synchronize access to the <see cref="T:System.Collections.Stack" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取可用于同步对 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Stack" /> 的访问的对象。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Object" /> that can be used to synchronize access to the <see cref="T:System.Collections.Stack" />.
trans-unit.target: 一个可用于同步对 <see cref="T:System.Object" /> 的访问的 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Stack" />。

trans-unit.source: To create a synchronized version of the <xref:System.Collections.Stack>, use the <xref:System.Collections.Stack.Synchronized%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要创建的同步的版本<xref:System.Collections.Stack>，使用<xref:System.Collections.Stack.Synchronized%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: However, derived classes can provide their own synchronized version of the <xref:System.Collections.Stack> using the <xref:System.Collections.Stack.SyncRoot%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 但是，派生的类可以提供自己的同步的版本<xref:System.Collections.Stack>使用<xref:System.Collections.Stack.SyncRoot%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The synchronizing code must perform operations on the <xref:System.Collections.Stack.SyncRoot%2A> of the <xref:System.Collections.Stack>, not directly on the <xref:System.Collections.Stack>.
trans-unit.target: 同步代码必须在执行操作<xref:System.Collections.Stack.SyncRoot%2A>的<xref:System.Collections.Stack>，而不是直接在<xref:System.Collections.Stack>。

trans-unit.source: This ensures proper operation of collections that are derived from other objects.
trans-unit.target: 这样可确保对从其他对象派生的集合正确地执行操作。

trans-unit.source: Specifically, it maintains proper synchronization with other threads that might be simultaneously modifying the <xref:System.Collections.Stack> object.
trans-unit.target: 具体地说，这样可保持正确的同步，与可能同时对修改其他线程<xref:System.Collections.Stack>对象。

trans-unit.source: Enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure.
trans-unit.target: 枚举整个集合本质上不是一个线程安全的过程。

trans-unit.source: Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads can still modify the collection, which causes the enumerator to throw an exception.
trans-unit.target: 即使某个集合已同步，其他线程仍可以修改该集合，这会导致枚举数引发异常。

trans-unit.source: To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can either lock the collection during the entire enumeration or catch the exceptions resulting from changes made by other threads.
trans-unit.target: 若要确保枚举过程中的线程安全性，可以在整个枚举期间锁定集合，或者捕获由其他线程进行的更改所导致的异常。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to lock the collection using the <xref:System.Collections.Stack.SyncRoot%2A> during the entire enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何锁定集合使用<xref:System.Collections.Stack.SyncRoot%2A>在整个枚举期间。

trans-unit.source: Retrieving the value of this property is an O(1) operation.
trans-unit.target: 检索此属性的值的运算复杂度为 O(1)。

trans-unit.source: Copies the <see cref="T:System.Collections.Stack" /> to a new array.
trans-unit.target: 将 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Stack" /> 复制到新数组中。

trans-unit.source: A new array containing copies of the elements of the <see cref="T:System.Collections.Stack" />.
trans-unit.target: 新数组，包含 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Stack" /> 的元素的副本。

trans-unit.source: The elements are copied onto the array in last-in-first-out (LIFO) order, similar to the order of the elements returned by a succession of calls to <xref:System.Collections.Stack.Pop%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 将元素复制到的数组中先出 (LIFO) 顺序，对由调用的一系列元素的顺序类似<xref:System.Collections.Stack.Pop%2A>。

trans-unit.source: This method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is <xref:System.Collections.Stack.Count%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 此方法为 O (`n`) 操作，其中`n`是<xref:System.Collections.Stack.Count%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to copy a <xref:System.Collections.Stack> into a one-dimensional array.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何复制<xref:System.Collections.Stack>到一维数组。
